message.body: Do you mind texting me the status of the mtg once we hear from katie? I'll be away from email until then.
Jen says: "OK, I think we need 90 minutes, so could we do noon to 1:30? Is that OK? I know it is not ideal, but I will be in much better form then and 3-4 isn't enough time, I don't think. "
Yea, that's fine with me- i can skip my other mtg
K I will email them for both of us
